Translations.Text: Vi not those argue di proofs kaj kiel ili hav deviated
Ili est des unu disbelieved scripture messages ni send our messengers. Do ili do gxi surely trov out
shackles est their kol cxen est uz al tren them
En Inferno tiam en Fajr ili brul
Ili pet Kie est idols vi uz worship
beside DI? Ili dir Ili abandoned us. En fakt, when ni worshipped them ni worshipping nothing. Do does DI send disbelievers astray
This vi uz gxoj false doctrines ter vi uz promote them
Enter gates Gehenna wherein vi abide forever Ki miserable destiny por arrogant unu
Vi est pacient di promes est truth. Ni montr vi kelk da (retribution) ni promes them terminate your life antaux ke, ili returned us
Ni send messengers vi - kelk da them ni menci vi kelk ni ne menci vi. Ne messenger produkt any mirakl di authorization Once di judgment issued truth dominates falsifiers exposed humiliated
